entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @RealCandaceO I'm a hardcore conservative and a big fan of yours.   I also believe we should follow Sweden's example and NOT shut down the economy - but, let's face it, most of us know at least one person who lost life through covid19.  (i know about 5).  Certainly more dangerous than the flu
